org.jclouds.abiquo.internal

Class BaseCloudService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jclouds.abiquo.internal.BaseCloudService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CloudService

    @Singleton
public class BaseCloudService
extends Object
implements CloudService
    Provides high level Abiquo cloud operations.
    Author:
    Ignasi Barrera, Francesc Montserrat
